Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:AssetsValidation", "fac:Assets", "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquity"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $duration-period as object? := facts:duration-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $instant-period as string?  := facts:instant-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $aligned-period as string  := ( $duration-period.End, $instant-period, "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string :=
  facts:canonical-grouping-key($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, $facts:UNIT, $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
for $duration-string as string? allowing empty in distinct-values($facts[$$.Concept.PeriodType eq "duration"].$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD)
let $facts := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD = ($duration-string, $aligned-period)]
let $warnings as string* := ()
let $AssetsValidation as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:AssetsValidation"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($AssetsValidation) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($AssetsValidation.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept AssetsValidation."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept AssetsValidation."
                             else ())
let $AssetsValidation as object? := $AssetsValidation[1]
let $Assets as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Assets"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($Assets) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($Assets.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept Assets."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept Assets."
                             else ())
let $Assets as object? := $Assets[1]
let $LiabilitiesAndEquity as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquity"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($LiabilitiesAndEquity) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($LiabilitiesAndEquity.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept LiabilitiesAndEquity."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept LiabilitiesAndEquity."
                             else ())
let $LiabilitiesAndEquity as object? := $LiabilitiesAndEquity[1]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($AssetsValidation) return $AssetsValidation
  case (exists($Assets) and true)
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($Assets) eq rules:decimal-value($LiabilitiesAndEquity)
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := 
         rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " = " || rules:fact-trail($LiabilitiesAndEquity, "LiabilitiesAndEquity")
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := ($audit-trail-message, $warnings)
    let $source-facts as object* := ($AssetsValidation, $Assets, $LiabilitiesAndEquity)
    let $rule as object :=
        copy $newRule := $rule
        modify (
            if(exists($newRule("Label"))) then ()
                                          else insert json { "Label": "[BS2] Assets = LiabilitiesAndEquity" } into $newRule
          )
        return $newRule
    let $fact as object :=
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $Assets,
          "fac:AssetsValidation",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options,
            $Assets,
            $computed-value)
    return
        copy $newFact := $fact
        modify (
            if(exists($newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit") with $_unit
                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("DataType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("DataType") with "xbrli:booleanItemType"
                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:booleanItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("PeriodType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("PeriodType") with "instant"
                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "instant" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  default return ()

for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:AssetsValidation2", "fac:Assets", "fac:CurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentAssets"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $duration-period as object? := facts:duration-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $instant-period as string?  := facts:instant-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $aligned-period as string  := ( $duration-period.End, $instant-period, "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string :=
  facts:canonical-grouping-key($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, $facts:UNIT, $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
for $duration-string as string? allowing empty in distinct-values($facts[$$.Concept.PeriodType eq "duration"].$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD)
let $facts := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD = ($duration-string, $aligned-period)]
let $warnings as string* := ()
let $AssetsValidation2 as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:AssetsValidation2"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($AssetsValidation2) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($AssetsValidation2.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept AssetsValidation2."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept AssetsValidation2."
                             else ())
let $AssetsValidation2 as object? := $AssetsValidation2[1]
let $Assets as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Assets"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($Assets) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($Assets.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept Assets."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept Assets."
                             else ())
let $Assets as object? := $Assets[1]
let $CurrentAssets as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CurrentAssets"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($CurrentAssets) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($CurrentAssets.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept CurrentAssets."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept CurrentAssets."
                             else ())
let $CurrentAssets as object? := $CurrentAssets[1]
let $NoncurrentAssets as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NoncurrentAssets"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($NoncurrentAssets) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($NoncurrentAssets.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept NoncurrentAssets."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept NoncurrentAssets."
                             else ())
let $NoncurrentAssets as object? := $NoncurrentAssets[1]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($AssetsValidation2) return $AssetsValidation2
  case (exists($Assets) and true)
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($Assets) eq rules:decimal-value($CurrentAssets) + rules:decimal-value($NoncurrentAssets)
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := 
         rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " = " || rules:fact-trail($CurrentAssets, "CurrentAssets") || " + " || rules:fact-trail($NoncurrentAssets, "NoncurrentAssets")
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := ($audit-trail-message, $warnings)
    let $source-facts as object* := ($AssetsValidation2, $Assets, $CurrentAssets, $NoncurrentAssets)
    let $rule as object :=
        copy $newRule := $rule
        modify (
            if(exists($newRule("Label"))) then ()
                                          else insert json { "Label": "[BS3] Assets = CurrentAssets + NoncurrentAssets" } into $newRule
          )
        return $newRule
    let $fact as object :=
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $Assets,
          "fac:AssetsValidation2",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options,
            $Assets,
            $computed-value)
    return
        copy $newFact := $fact
        modify (
            if(exists($newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit") with $_unit
                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("DataType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("DataType") with "xbrli:booleanItemType"
                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:booleanItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("PeriodType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("PeriodType") with "instant"
                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "instant" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  default return ()

Rules.Label: Balance Sheet Format imputation
Rules.Formula: for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal(( "fac:BalanceSheetFormat", "fac:DocumentType", "fac:CurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities", "fac:CurrentLiabilities"), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options) let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1] group by $canonical-filter-string := facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", $facts:PERIOD, $facts:UNIT, "Balance")), $aligned-period let $BalanceSheetFormat as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:BalanceSheetFormat"] let $DocumentType as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:DocumentType"] let $CurrentAssets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CurrentAssets"] let $NoncurrentAssets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NoncurrentAssets"] let $NoncurrentLiabilities as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities"] let $CurrentLiabilities as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CurrentLiabilities"] return switch (true) case exists($BalanceSheetFormat) return $BalanceSheetFormat case(exists($DocumentType)) return let $computed-value := if (rules:decimal-value($CurrentAssets) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($NoncurrentAssets) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($NoncurrentLiabilities) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($CurrentLiabilities) eq 0) then "Unclassified" else "Classified" let $audit-trail-message := rules:fact-trail({ "Aspects" : { "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:BalanceSheetFormat" }, Value: $computed-value , Type: "NonNumericValue" }) || " = " || $computed-value || " (because " || rules:fact-trail($CurrentAssets, "fac:CurrentAssets") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($NoncurrentAssets, "fac:NoncurrentAssets") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($NoncurrentLiabilities, "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($CurrentLiabilities, "fac:CurrentLiabilities") || ")" let $source-facts := ( $CurrentAssets, $NoncurrentAssets, $NoncurrentLiabilities, $CurrentLiabilities) return copy $newfact := rules:create-computed-fact( ($DocumentType, $source-facts)[1], "fac:BalanceSheetFormat", $computed-value, $rule, $audit-trail-message, $source-facts, $options) modify ( replace value of json $newfact("Type") with "NonNumericValue" ) return $newfact default return ()

Rules.Label: CommonStockSharesOutstanding imputation

Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss", "fac:NetIncomeLoss", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $duration-period as object? := facts:duration-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $instant-period as string?  := facts:instant-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $aligned-period as string  := ( $duration-period.End, $instant-period, "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string :=
  facts:canonical-grouping-key($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, $facts:UNIT, $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
for $duration-string as string? allowing empty in distinct-values($facts[$$.Concept.PeriodType eq "duration"].$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD)
let $facts := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD = ($duration-string, $aligned-period)]
let $warnings as string* := ()
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept ComprehensiveIncomeLoss."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept ComprehensiveIncomeLoss."
                             else ())
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object? := $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss[1]
let $NetIncomeLoss as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NetIncomeLoss"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($NetIncomeLoss) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($NetIncomeLoss.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept NetIncomeLoss."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept NetIncomeLoss."
                             else ())
let $NetIncomeLoss as object? := $NetIncomeLoss[1]
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent."
                             else ())
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent as object? := $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent[1]
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest."
                             else ())
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest as object? := $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest[1]
let $OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss."
                             else ())
let $OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object? := $OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss[1]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss) return $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss
  case (exists($NetIncomeLoss) and (not((not(exists($NetIncomeLoss)))) and not((not(exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent)))) and (rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) - rules:decimal-value($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent) eq 0) and (rules:decimal-value($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest) eq 0) and (rules:decimal-value($OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss) eq 0)))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss)
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss")
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := ($audit-trail-message, $warnings)
    let $source-facts as object* := ($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss, $NetIncomeLoss, $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent, $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest, $OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss)
    let $rule as object :=
        copy $newRule := $rule
        modify (
            if(exists($newRule("Label"))) then ()
                                          else insert json { "Label": "Comprehensive Income (Loss)" } into $newRule
          )
        return $newRule
    let $fact as object :=
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $NetIncomeLoss,
          "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
    return
        copy $newFact := $fact
        modify (
            if(exists($newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit") with $_unit
                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("DataType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("DataType") with "xbrli:monetaryItemType"
                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:monetaryItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("PeriodType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("PeriodType") with "duration"
                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "duration" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  default return ()

for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments", "fac:NetIncomeLoss"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $duration-period as object? := facts:duration-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $instant-period as string?  := facts:instant-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $aligned-period as string  := ( $duration-period.End, $instant-period, "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string :=
  facts:canonical-grouping-key($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, $facts:UNIT, $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
for $duration-string as string? allowing empty in distinct-values($facts[$$.Concept.PeriodType eq "duration"].$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD)
let $facts := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD = ($duration-string, $aligned-period)]

Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:CostsAndExpenses", "fac:OperatingExpenses", "fac:CostOfRevenue", "fac:GrossProfit", "fac:Revenues", "fac:OperatingIncomeLoss", "fac:OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $duration-period as object? := facts:duration-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $instant-period as string?  := facts:instant-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })

group by $canonical-filter-string :=

let $warnings as string* := ()
let $CostsAndExpenses as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CostsAndExpenses"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($CostsAndExpenses) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($CostsAndExpenses.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept CostsAndExpenses."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept CostsAndExpenses."
                             else ())

let $OperatingExpenses as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:OperatingExpenses"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($OperatingExpenses) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($OperatingExpenses.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept OperatingExpenses."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept OperatingExpenses."

let $OperatingExpenses as object? := $OperatingExpenses[1]

let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($CostOfRevenue) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($CostOfRevenue.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept CostOfRevenue."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept CostOfRevenue."

let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($GrossProfit) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($GrossProfit.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept GrossProfit."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept GrossProfit."
                             else ())
let $GrossProfit as object? := $GrossProfit[1]
let $Revenues as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Revenues"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($Revenues) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($Revenues.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept Revenues."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept Revenues."
                             else ())

let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($OperatingIncomeLoss) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($OperatingIncomeLoss.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept OperatingIncomeLoss."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept OperatingIncomeLoss."
                             else ())

                             then if(count(distinct-values($OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses.Value)) gt 1)

                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses."
                             else ())

return
  switch (true)
  case exists($CostsAndExpenses) return $CostsAndExpenses
  case (exists($CostOfRevenue) and not((not(exists($OperatingExpenses)))))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($CostOfRevenue) + rules:decimal-value($OperatingExpenses)

                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:monetaryItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,

                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "duration" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  case (exists($Revenues) and (not(exists($GrossProfit)) and not((not(exists($Revenues)))) and not((not(exists($OperatingIncomeLoss)))) and not((not(exists($OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses))))))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($Revenues) - rules:decimal-value($OperatingIncomeLoss) - rules:decimal-value($OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses)
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:CostsAndExpenses" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($OperatingIncomeLoss, "OperatingIncomeLoss") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses, "OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses")
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := ($audit-trail-message, $warnings)
    let $source-facts as object* := ($CostsAndExpenses, $OperatingExpenses, $CostOfRevenue, $GrossProfit, $Revenues, $OperatingIncomeLoss, $OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses)
    let $rule as object :=
        copy $newRule := $rule
        modify (
            if(exists($newRule("Label"))) then ()
                                          else insert json { "Label": "Costs and Expenses" } into $newRule
          )
        return $newRule
    let $fact as object :=
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $Revenues,
          "fac:CostsAndExpenses",
          $computed-value,

    return

        modify (

                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,

                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:monetaryItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("PeriodType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("PeriodType") with "duration"
                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "duration" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  default return ()

Rules.Formula: for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal(( "fac:IncomeStatementFormat", "fac:GrossProfit", "fac:CostOfRevenue", "fac:Revenues"), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options) group by $canonical-filter-string := if(empty($facts)) then "" else facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance")) let $IncomeStatementFormat as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:IncomeStatementFormat"] let $GrossProfit as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:GrossProfit"] let $CostOfRevenue as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CostOfRevenue"] let $Revenues as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Revenues"] return switch(true) case exists($IncomeStatementFormat) return $IncomeStatementFormat case exists($Revenues) return let $computed-value := if (rules:decimal-value($GrossProfit) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($CostOfRevenue) eq 0) then "Single-step" else "Multi-step" let $audit-trail-message := rules:fact-trail({ "Aspects" : { "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:IncomeStatementFormat" }, Value: $computed-value , Type: "NonNumericValue"}) || " = " || $computed-value || " (because " || rules:fact-trail($GrossProfit, "GrossProfit") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($CostOfRevenue, "CostOfRevenue") || ")" let $source-facts := ( $GrossProfit, $CostOfRevenue) return copy $newfact := rules:create-computed-fact( ($source-facts, $Revenues)[1], "fac:IncomeStatementFormat", $computed-value, $rule, $audit-trail-message, $source-facts, $options) modify ( replace value of json $newfact("Type") with "NonNumericValue" ) return $newfact default return ()

  facts:canonical-grouping-key($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, $facts:UNIT, $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
for $duration-string as string? allowing empty in distinct-values($facts[$$.Concept.PeriodType eq "duration"].$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD)
let $facts := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD = ($duration-string, $aligned-period)]
let $warnings as string* := ()
let $OperatingExpenses as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:OperatingExpenses"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($OperatingExpenses) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($OperatingExpenses.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept OperatingExpenses."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept OperatingExpenses."
                             else ())
let $OperatingExpenses as object? := $OperatingExpenses[1]
let $CostOfRevenue as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CostOfRevenue"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($CostOfRevenue) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($CostOfRevenue.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept CostOfRevenue."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept CostOfRevenue."
                             else ())
let $CostOfRevenue as object? := $CostOfRevenue[1]
let $CostsAndExpenses as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CostsAndExpenses"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($CostsAndExpenses) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($CostsAndExpenses.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept CostsAndExpenses."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept CostsAndExpenses."
                             else ())
let $CostsAndExpenses as object? := $CostsAndExpenses[1]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($OperatingExpenses) return $OperatingExpenses
  case (exists($CostsAndExpenses) and not((not(exists($CostOfRevenue)))))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($CostsAndExpenses) - rules:decimal-value($CostOfRevenue)
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:OperatingExpenses" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         rules:fact-trail($CostsAndExpenses, "CostsAndExpenses") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($CostOfRevenue, "CostOfRevenue")
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := ($audit-trail-message, $warnings)
    let $source-facts as object* := ($OperatingExpenses, $CostOfRevenue, $CostsAndExpenses)
    let $rule as object :=
        copy $newRule := $rule
        modify (
            if(exists($newRule("Label"))) then ()
                                          else insert json { "Label": "Operating Expenses" } into $newRule
          )
        return $newRule
    let $fact as object :=
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $CostsAndExpenses,
          "fac:OperatingExpenses",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
    return
        copy $newFact := $fact
        modify (
            if(exists($newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit") with $_unit
                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("DataType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("DataType") with "xbrli:monetaryItemType"
                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:monetaryItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("PeriodType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("PeriodType") with "duration"
                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "duration" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  default return ()

          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
    return
        copy $newFact := $fact
        modify (
            if(exists($newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit") with $_unit
                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,if(exists($newFact("Decimals"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Decimals") with 3
                                             else insert json { "Decimals": 3 } into $newFact

                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "duration" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )

  default return ()

let $duration-period as object? := facts:duration-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })
let $instant-period as string?  := facts:instant-for-fact($facts, {Typed: false })

for $duration-string as string? allowing empty in distinct-values($facts[$$.Concept.PeriodType eq "duration"].$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD)
let $facts := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD = ($duration-string, $aligned-period)]
let $warnings as string* := ()
let $SustainableGrowthRate as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:SustainableGrowthRate"]

                             then if(count(distinct-values($SustainableGrowthRate.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept SustainableGrowthRate."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept SustainableGrowthRate."
                             else ())

let $Equity as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Equity"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($Equity) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($Equity.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept Equity."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept Equity."
                             else ())
let $Equity as object? := $Equity[1]
let $Assets as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Assets"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($Assets) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($Assets.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept Assets."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept Assets."
                             else ())
let $Assets as object? := $Assets[1]
let $Revenues as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Revenues"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($Revenues) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($Revenues.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept Revenues."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept Revenues."
                             else ())
let $Revenues as object? := $Revenues[1]
let $NetIncomeLoss as object* := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NetIncomeLoss"]
let $warnings := ($warnings, if(count($NetIncomeLoss) gt 1)
                             then if(count(distinct-values($NetIncomeLoss.Value)) gt 1)
                                  then "Cell collision with conflicting values for concept NetIncomeLoss."
                                  else "Cell collision with consistent values for concept NetIncomeLoss."
                             else ())
let $NetIncomeLoss as object? := $NetIncomeLoss[1]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($SustainableGrowthRate) return $SustainableGrowthRate
  case (exists($NetIncomeLoss) and (rules:decimal-value($Equity) ne 0 and rules:decimal-value($Assets) ne 0 and rules:decimal-value($Revenues) ne 0 and rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) ne 0))
  return
    let $computed-value := ((rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) div rules:decimal-value($Revenues)) * (1 + (rules:decimal-value($Assets) - rules:decimal-value($Equity)) div rules:decimal-value($Equity))) div ((1 div (rules:decimal-value($Revenues) div rules:decimal-value($Assets))) - ((rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) div rules:decimal-value($Revenues)) * (1 + (rules:decimal-value($Assets) - rules:decimal-value($Equity)) div rules:decimal-value($Equity))))
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:SustainableGrowthRate" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         " ( " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss") || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " )" || " * " || " ( " || "1" || " + " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " )" || " div " || " ( " || " ( " || "1" || " div " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " )" || " )" || " - " || " ( " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss") || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " )" || " * " || " ( " || "1" || " + " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " )" || " )"
    let $audit-trail-message as string* := ($audit-trail-message, $warnings)
    let $source-facts as object* := ($SustainableGrowthRate, $Equity, $Assets, $Revenues, $NetIncomeLoss)
    let $rule as object :=
        copy $newRule := $rule
        modify (
            if(exists($newRule("Label"))) then ()
                                          else insert json { "Label": "Sustainable Growth Rate (SGR)" } into $newRule
          )
        return $newRule
    let $fact as object :=
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $NetIncomeLoss,
          "fac:SustainableGrowthRate",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
    return
        copy $newFact := $fact
        modify (
            if(exists($newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Aspects")("xbrl:Unit") with $_unit
                                                         else insert json { "xbrl:Unit": $_unit } into $newFact("Aspects")
            ,if(exists($newFact("Decimals"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Decimals") with 3
                                             else insert json { "Decimals": 3 } into $newFact
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("DataType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("DataType") with "xbrli:pureItemType"
                                                         else insert json { "DataType": "xbrli:pureItemType" } into $newFact("Concept")
            ,
              if(exists($newFact("Concept")("PeriodType"))) then replace value of json $newFact("Concept")("PeriodType") with "duration"
                                                         else insert json { "PeriodType": "duration" } into $newFact("Concept")
          )
        return $newFact
  default return ()

Formulae.BodySrc:
(( NetIncomeLoss / Revenues ) * (1 + ( Assets - Equity ) / Equity ))
  / (( 1 / ( Revenues / Assets )) - (( NetIncomeLoss / Revenues ) * (1 + ( Assets - Equity ) /Equity )))

$facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" eq $member] return let $source-fact := $salesVolume let $value := local:valueAdjusted($concept, $salesVolume) let $unit := local:unitsAdjusted($concept, $salesVolume) let $original-concept := $salesVolume.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT let $audit-trail-message := "concept to member mapping: '" || $concept || "' -> '" || $original-concept || "(us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis::" || $member || ")'" return copy $f := rules:create-computed-fact( $source-fact, $concept, $value, $rule, $audit-trail-message, $source-fact, $options) modify ( if(exists($f.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis")) then delete json $f.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" else (), replace value of json $f.Aspects."xbrl:Unit" with $unit ) return $f
